thread.title: USD/JPY Likely Remain Firm in 120-121 Range
thread.title_full: USD/JPY Likely Remain Firm in 120-121 Range - WSJ

author: Hiroyuki Kachi
title: USD/JPY Likely Remain Firm in 120-121 Range
text: 2308 GMT [Dow Jones] The USD/JPY will likely remain firm in a 120.00-121.00 range during Asia trade, given continued strength in the global stock markets (DJIA up 304 points overnight), says Toshiyuki Umekawa, senior vice president of forex division at Mizuho Bank. With market sentiment cleared up on TPP trade deal agreement, the Nikkei is testing its rebound, allowing “investors to continue to place bids on the USD/JPY,” he says. The pair (now at 120.44) keeps its strength also on expectations that the BOJ will ease its monetary grip later this month (policy meetings scheduled twice, Oct. 6-7 and Oct. 30.) But he...
